# init(inkType:color:)

**Initializer**

Creates an ink tool object with the default line width and the specified color.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(inkType type: __PKInkType, color: NSColor)
```

```swift
convenience init(inkType type: __PKInkType, color: UIColor)
```

## Parameters

- **type**: The shape of the tool. You may specify [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKInkTypeMarker], [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKInkTypePen], or [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKInkTypePencil].
- **color**: The color to apply to drawn lines.

## Return Value

A new inking tool with the specified type and color.

## Discussion

This method sets the line width to the value returned by [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKInkingToolReference/defaultWidth(forInkType:)].

## Creating an inking tool

- **init(inkType:color:width:)**: Creates an ink tool object with the specified color and line width values.
- **init(ink:width:)**: Create an inking tool with the specified ink and width.
